requirements: Basic understanding of HTML and CSS

Motivation to learn and explore web development
objectives: Understand the basics of HTML
Learn how to style web pages using CSS
Gain knowledge of JavaScript and its use in web development
Explore responsive design and its importance in web development
Acquire skills in building interactive web applications

requirements: Experience with HTML and CSS

Learn advanced CSS techniques
